Class Geometry

java.lang.Object
model.Geometry
Direct Known Subclasses:
Line, Point, Rectangle, Triangle
public abstract class Geometry extends Object
Abstract class representing a geometric shape. This class serves as a base for specific geometric shapes (e.g., Point, Line, Rectangle).
Author:
Kisal Date: 24 December 2024

  • Constructor Details

    • Geometry

      public Geometry(int x, int y, int x2, int y2)
      Constructor to initialize the geometry with starting and ending coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - Starting x-coordinate
      y - Starting y-coordinate
      x2 - Ending x-coordinate
      y2 - Ending y-coordinate

      public abstract void draw(Graphics g)
      Abstract method to draw the geometry on a graphical canvas.
      Parameters:
      g - Graphics object used for rendering.

    • saveToDatabase

      public abstract void saveToDatabase(Connection conn) throws SQLException
      Abstract method to save the geometry to the database.
      Parameters:
      conn - Database connection.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an SQL error occurs.

    • loadFromDatabase

      public abstract Geometry loadFromDatabase(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException
      Abstract method to load the geometry from a database ResultSet.
      Parameters:
      rs - ResultSet containing the geometry data.
      Returns:
      An instance of the specific geometry subclass.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an SQL error occurs.
